languages.text: "Эрэбис... Знакомое клановое имя. Прошу Вашу Светлость дать мне немного времени — архивы флагмана огромны, но я приложу все усилия, чтобы отыскать Нааки Эрэбис как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "Эрэбис... Знакомое родовое имя. Прошу Вашу Светлость дать мне немного времени — архивы флагмана огромны, но я приложу все усилия, чтобы отыскать Нааки Эрэбис как можно скорее".

languages.text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "Эрэбис... Знакомое клановое имя. Прошу Вашу Светлость дать мне немного времени — архивы флагмана огромны, но я приложу все усилия, чтобы отыскать Нааки Эрэбис как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as I can."

languages.text: « Erebis... Ce nom me dit quelque chose. Si Votre Seigneurie accepte de me laisser un peu de temps, je vais consulter les archives du vaisseau amiral. Elles sont si vastes que je devrais rapidement trouver des informations sur cette Naaki Erebis. »
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Erebis... Ce nom me dit quelque chose. Si Votre Seigneurie accepte de me laisser un peu de temps, je vais consulter les archives du vaisseau amiral. Elles sont si vastes que je devrais rapidement trouver des informations sur cette Naaki Erebis. »

languages.text: «Erebis... Me suena el nombre del clan. Si mi{mf|lord|lady} me da tiempo para estudiar los inmensos archivos de la nave insignia, no escatimaré en esfuerzos para dar con Naaki Erebis cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Erebis... Me suena el nombre del clan. Si mi{mf|lord|lady} me da tiempo para estudiar los inmensos archivos de la nave insignia, no escatimaré en esfuerzos para dar con Naaki Erebis cuanto antes».

languages.text: 「エレビス…その一族の名には聞き覚えがあります。陛下、旗艦のアーカイブは膨大ですので、少々お時間をいただけますか。全力を尽くして、一刻も早くナアキ・エレビスを見つけてみせます」
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「エレビス…その一族の名には聞き覚えがあります。陛下、旗艦のアーカイブは膨大なので、少々お時間をいただけますか。全力を尽くして、ナアキ・エレビスを一刻も早く見つけてみせます」

languages.text: “伊雷比斯……这个氏族的名字很熟悉。不过旗舰上的档案实在是太多了，大人，请您给我一点点时间，我立刻寻找这个叫拿基·伊雷比斯的人。”
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “伊雷比斯……这个氏族的名字很熟悉。不过旗舰上的档案实在是太多了，大人，请您给我一点点时间，我立刻寻找这个叫拿基·伊雷比斯的人。”

languages.text: "Erebis ... Der Clan-Name kommt mir bekannt vor. Gebt mir bitte etwas Zeit, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denn die Archive des Flaggschiffs sind sehr groß, aber ich werde mir alle Mühe geben, Naaki Erebis so schnell wie möglich zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Erebis ... Der Clan-Name kommt mir bekannt vor. Gebt mir bitte etwas Zeit, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denn die Archive des Flaggschiffs sind sehr groß, aber ich werde mir alle Mühe geben, Naaki Erebis so schnell wie möglich zu finden."

languages.text: "Erebis... Klan ismi tanıdık geliyor. Sancak gemisi arşivlerinin bir hayli geniş olduğunu düşünürsek {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bana biraz zaman tanımasını rica edeceğim. Emin olun, Naaki Erebis'i bir an önce bulmak için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "Erebis... The clan name is familiar. If I may ask Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship to give me a little time, the flagship's archives being as vast as they are, I will spare no effort in finding Naaki Erebis as soon as possible."
